response.overview: Based on "The Last of Us" video game by Naughty Dog, Violent Endeavors is about being hunted through the city and into an abandoned store by desperate and crazy people in Pittsburgh. The story follows Joel and Elliot as they navigate through a harsh landscape where hunters can pop out at any given moment.
response.tagline: In a run down world reclaimed by mother nature, the only thing left to fear is us.
response.title: Violent Endeavors
